## Pull Request Template

Thank you for contributing to `Express-Kickstart-NodeJS-Web-App-Template`!

Before submitting your pull request, please ensure:

### 1.  Description of Changes

*   Provide a clear and concise description of the changes you are proposing. 
*   What problem are you solving?
*   What is the expected outcome?
*   Reference any related issues or pull requests.

### 2.  Code Quality

*   **Code Style:**  Adhere to the project's coding style and conventions (see `.eslintrc.js` or similar configuration). Run linters and formatters (e.g., ESLint, Prettier) to ensure code consistency.  Ensure there are no linting errors before submitting the PR.
*   **Tests:**  Include unit tests and/or integration tests that cover your changes. If you've added new features, write tests to verify their functionality. If you've fixed a bug, write a test that reproduces the bug and then verifies the fix.  All tests should pass before submitting the PR.
*   **Documentation:** Update any necessary documentation, including the `README.md` and inline comments.

### 3. Checklist

*   [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/chirag127/Express-Kickstart-NodeJS-Web-App-Template/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide.
*   [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
*   [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
*   [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
*   [ ] New and existing unit tests pass.
*   [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules.

### 4.  Additional Context (Optional)

*   Any other information that might be helpful for reviewers.

---
